content: use fingering weight yarn held doubled my favourite use of leftover sock yarn use lace weight yarn held trebled or quadrupled a very tall dog might require the length but not as much width so consider working the increases in the centre only once you reach sufficient width work a buttonhole into the garter border and use a button as the closure use the bind-off tail to crochet a loop as a button-closer i personally do not recommend these last two when used for an animal potential choking hazard if they like to chew but would be perfectly fine for an older human if wanting to match your dog when out walking i d love to see your project on ravelry please use tag #ginnieswinterbandana on other social media see new projects or designs on instagram @ginnie_the_greyt *~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~ 3
